snippet.title: Atlus USA Trailer: Hexyz Force
snippet.description:
After an epic battle with Delgaia, the God of Destruction, the world of Berge was divided into two: one of constant sunlight and the other of constant darkness. Now the two halves will have to join forces to stop the events that threaten all of Berge.

Available May 25, 2010.

For more information, visit:
http://www.atlus.com/hexyzforce
